text: Dragon Quest music always puts me in a good mood. I still have yet to play DQXI S, I'm waiting a bit since I finished VIII on the 3DS not too long ago and I want to fully appreciate it. DQVI is widely regarded as the lesser entry in the Zenithia trilogy and while I actually agree, it's still a top notch RPG.

text: The weakest game in the series?  Sure, but it's still great.  Not a single real bad game in the entirety of Dragon Quest.
author: ParrotMan01

text: eh, imho the weakest game in the series is the first. But without it, there would be none of the others, of course. ;)
author: Marinanor

text:
Dragon quest games are such wonderful games...
Good RPG with memorable musics, story, game life. I think they never get old.
They are the kind of games, even if I played them 5 times, I could do the story once more and still get the same feelings  !
author: Achillion

text: I believe that I have been subscribed to your channel for over ten years. I want to thank you for all of the amazing musical content you have posted. It is most appreciated!
author: Landural

text:
I just finished playing this one for the first time! The mobile port is pretty darn good.

Unfortunately 7 isn't on there, and 8 has been significantly downgraded to run well on mobile platforms. Hoping they'll be out on PC someday.
author: Forum Arcade

text: This game was pretty great. Finished about half a year ago. The secret ending was certainly unique and I've never seen any other rpg do something like that.

text: I wonder why everybody says that this game isn't as good as other dragon quest ones, I think it's even better than the Fifth chapter ._.

text: I agree. It has less mass appeal because it's not as intimate and personal as V and is more combat focused, but I like it more for its outlandish concepts and vignette structure
